item.title: On the Sovereignty of CryptoCurrencies -- What Bitcoin can Learn from Somaliland
item.description: Recently a video was made: “The Declaration of Bitcoin's Independence”. Here's the video. For those of you not involved with the, all in all, rather small cryptocurrency community the people in that video are some of the bigger names within the community. The village elders if you will. Not sure the village actually chose them, but elders tend to be self appointed anyway – at least at first. My friend and business partner, Preston, provided his response in this fine article.
